content.rendered:
Keynote Speakers

Kevin Blankespoor

Vice President and General Manager of Warehouse Robotics | Boston Dynamics

Rick Faulk

Chief Executive Officer | Locus Robotics

Greg Smith

President, Industrial Automation Group | Teradyne

Featured Speakers

Steve Crowe

Editor | The Robot Report

Dan Kara

Vice President, Robotics | WTWH Media LLC

YJ Lim

Senior Technical Robotics Product Manager | MathWorks

Mike Oitzman

Editor | Robotics

Matthew Robinson

Program Manager | ROS-Industrial Consortium – Americas


Parna Sarkar-Basu

CEO and Founder | Brand and Buzz Marketing, LLC
